name: Ambul Thiyal (Sour Fish Curry)
description: Dry fish curry with goraka, a Southern specialty
instructions: Marinate fish with curry powder, chili, pepper, salt
Add cinnamon and curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Cook on low heat until dry
cultural_notes: Traditional Southern dish that keeps for days without refrigeration Use fresh fish from coastal markets. Goraka (garcinia) is essential for authentic sour taste - never substitute with tamarind. The curry should have a deep red color from roasted spices.
description_sinhala: දකුණේ විශේෂ ආහාරයක් වන ගොරකා සමග කරවල කරපිංචා
description_tamil: கோரக்காவுடன் உலர் மீன் குழம்பு, தென்னக ஸ்பெஷல்
cultural_notes_sinhala: ශීතකරණ නොමැතිව දින ගණනක් තබා ගන්නා සම්ප්‍රදායික දක්ෂිණ ආහාරය
cultural_notes_tamil: குளிர்சாதனப்பெட்டியில் இல்லாமல் நாட்கள் வைத்திருக்கும் பாரம்பரிய தெற்கு உணவு
